content.question: The output gap is measured by which of the following?

choices.label: The difference between nominal and real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The difference between actual and potential <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The difference between the expenditure side of <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and the income side of <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The difference between the actual rate of unemployment and the natural rate of unemployment.

The difference between the <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> deflator and the consumer price index in a given year.

content.answer: The difference between actual and potential <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
